events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the mistake as soon as possible.
Issue identified as a refund request related to receiving an incorrect item in the shipment.
Support case has been assigned to agent Julia for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your order. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 452367 and here is the photo showing the incorrect product I received instead of the camera lens I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund within 3-5 business days and send you a prepaid return label for the wrong item.
I appreciate the fast response and the solution proposed. Looking forward to the refund and return label.
The refund process is now initiated and you will receive the return label via email shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and return label. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I got the refund today and was able to send back the wrong item using the label. Thanks again for your help!
We are glad everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now, and thank you for contacting our support team.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey via email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our services.
